customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo that doesn't have sulfates. One concern is that I sometimes have to wash my hair 2x for it to feel all the way clean. Also, at the end of the bottle there was some lumpy mixture, which was kind of gross, maybe a settling issue.

product_meta.title: Moroccanoil Moisture Repair Shampoo
product_meta.description:
Size:8.5 Fl Oz

Moroccanoil Moisture Repair Shampoo gently cleanses and helps restore hair weakened and damaged by chemical processing, color or heat styling. Nourishing formula is infused with antioxidant-rich argan oil, reconstructive keratin and fatty acids for stronger, shinier and more manageable results. Fragranced with the signature Moroccanoil scent, an exotic blend of spicy amber aromas and sweet floral notes.

Suggested Use:

Massage through wet hair and scalp. Rinse thoroughly. Add more water to activate a rich lather. Follow with Moroccanoil Moisture Repair Conditioner.

All Ingredients: AQUA/WATER/EAU, SODIUM LAUROYL SARCOSINATE, DISODIUM LAURETH SULFOSUCCINATE, COCAMIDOPROPYL HYDROXYSULTAINE, COCAMIDE MEA, SODIUM LAURYL SULFOACETATE, GLYCOL DISTEARATE, DIMETHICONE, SODIUM LAUROYL LACTYLATE, HYDROLYZED VEGETABLE PROTEIN PG PROPYL SILANETRIOL, ARGANIA SPINOSA (ARGAN) KERNEL OIL, PERSEA GRATISSIMA (AVOCADO) OIL, SILK AMINO ACIDS, KERATIN AMINO ACIDS, HYDROLYZED KERATIN, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT, LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) FLOWER EXTRACT, SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED EXTRACT, CHAMOMILLA RECUTITA (MATRICARIA) FLOWER EXTRACT, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, PANTHENOL, AMODIMETHICONE, CETRIMONIUM CHLORIDE, TRIDECETH-12, DIMETHICONOL, DIVINYLDIMETHICONE/DIMETHICONE COPOLYMER, C12-13 PARETH-23, C12-13 PARETH-3, POLYQUATERNIUM-10, SODIUM PCA, QUATERNIUM-80, POLYQUATERNIUM-7, CINNAMIDOPROPYLTRIMONIUM CHLORIDE, PEG-150 PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRASTEARATE, PEG-6 CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC GLYCERIDES, CITRIC ACID, PHENOXYETHANOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, CHLORPHENESIN, CI 17200 (RED 33), CI 19140 (YELLOW 5), SODIUM ACETATE, ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL, TETRASODIUM EDTA, DISODIUM EDTA, SODIUM BENZOATE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, PARFUM/FRAGRANCE, CYCLOPENTASILOXANE, BUTYLPHENYL METHYLPROPIONAL, HYDROXYISOHEXYL 3-CYCLOHEXENE CARBOXALDEHYDE, LINALOOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE.
